package.name: staubli_resources

description.p: Shared configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Staubli manipulators.

This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files that are shared between different Staubli robot support packages within the ROS-Industrial program.
This package also contains common urdf / xacro resources used by other Staubli related packages.

package.author: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
